name: Slime Time (Daniel Koitka, MichaelPowell89, Donkey Club, StrikerXYZ)
name_original: Slime Time (Daniel Koitka, MichaelPowell89, Donkey Club, StrikerXYZ)
description:
You're a funky slime, separate and conjoin to travel through the laboratories' ventilation system.

Controls:
WASD - Move your slime around the level
Q - Join with your fellow slime
E - Divide your slime
Shift + Left Mouse Click - Select fellow slime

Team:
Daniel Koitka - Programming & Design
StrikerXYZ - Programming & Design
MichaelPowell89 - Design & QA
Leo Helix (Donkey Club) - Music & SFX
